gulp-pug
========
> Gulp plugin for PugJS

## Installation
```shell
$ npm install --save-dev gulp-pug
```

## Usage
```javascript
var gulp = require('gulp');
var pug = require('gulp-pug');

gulp.task('build', function build() {
  return gulp.src('views/**.pug')
    .pipe(pug(options))
    .pipe(gulp.dest('out'));
});
```
